sections.text: of act.The Indoor Tanning Facility Act does not apply to:(1) A physician licensed under the Uniform Credentialing Act who uses, in the practice of medicine, medical diagnostic and therapeutic equipment that emits ultraviolet radiation; or(2) Any individual who owns tanning equipment exclusively for personal, noncommercial use.SourceLaws 2014, LB132, ยง 4.Cross ReferencesUniform Credentialing Act, see section 38-101.

71-3904.Applicability of act.

The Indoor Tanning Facility Act does not apply to:

(1) A physician licensed under the Uniform Credentialing Act who uses, in the practice of medicine, medical diagnostic and therapeutic equipment that emits ultraviolet radiation; or

(2) Any individual who owns tanning equipment exclusively for personal, noncommercial use.

SourceLaws 2014, LB132, ยง 4.

Cross ReferencesUniform Credentialing Act, see section 38-101.
